questions.question: how to work efficiently
questions.answer:
If you want to work efficiently, you can try using the Pomodoro Technique. This technique helps you manage your time effectively by breaking work into intervals with short breaks in between. You can learn more about the Pomodoro Technique and how to implement it practically by following this link: https://moodle.hm.edu/pluginfile.php/1446288/mod_label/intro/Pomodoro_Kapitel%20Ablenkungen.pdf

Would you like to know more about other techniques for improving efficiency in your work?
